Diplomacy and Trade:
The theme of "Diplomacy and Trade" is relevant in the given text. The text discusses the AD/CVD (Antidumping and Countervailing Duty) program, which is a trade policy measure used by the US to address unfair trade practices such as dumping and subsidies. This program investigates complaints filed by US entities regarding these practices.

The text also mentions self-initiation, which allows the International Trade Administration (ITA) to monitor trade patterns and initiate investigations on its own, even before the affected entities become aware of any harm caused by unfair trade practices. This proactive monitoring and investigation are part of the US government's efforts to ensure fair trade and protect its domestic industries.

Therefore, the text highlights the relevance of the theme "Diplomacy and Trade" by demonstrating how trade policies, investigation processes, and monitoring mechanisms are implemented to regulate international commerce and maintain fair trade practices.
Finance, Economy:
The theme of "Finance, Economy" is relevant in the text as it mentions the AD/CVD program, which stands for Anti-Dumping/Countervailing Duties program. This program is a trade remedy tool used to protect domestic industries from unfair trade practices such as dumping (selling goods at a lower price in a foreign market compared to the home market) and countervailing (when foreign governments provide subsidies to their domestic industries). These practices can harm domestic industries and affect the economy.

The text also mentions that complaints filed by US entities trigger investigations under this program. This aspect relates to business development as it showcases the importance of protecting domestic businesses from unfair competition.

Additionally, the mention of self-initiation by the International Trade Administration (ITA) demonstrates oversight and the proactive monitoring of trade patterns. This is relevant to the theme as it highlights the role of government agencies in managing and regulating trade to ensure fair practices and protect the economy.

Although the text does not explicitly mention intellectual property protection, statistics, or taxation management, it primarily focuses on trade investigations and monitoring, which are related to finance and the economy.
Title: AD/CVD Self Initiation
